text: I took up one of the most difficult dance forms, Salsa, and I am doing very well in that. Well Done NC.
author: Naresh Chaurasia

affirmations.text: Let me start making shines videos. This is going to be a lot of fun. I don't have to rely too much on Socials etc.

applications.text: Started recording my dance practice sessions and created a YouTube channel for shines videos.

text: There has been tremendous improvement in my health, compared to my yester years. I am like a beast in Gym.
author: Naresh Chaurasia

comments.text: Need to focus on Breathing, Leg Strength, Side Plank.

affirmations.text: Let me make Pranayam and Deep Breathing part of my life.

applications.text: Incorporated 10 minutes of pranayam into my daily morning routine before gym.
